entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
